meanings.definition: Additional items that complement or enhance something else.
meanings.sent1: She bought some accessories to go with her new dress.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of accessories for smartphones.
meanings.sent3: The accessories for the party made it even more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the perfect accessory to her kind words.
meanings.sent5: The accessories in the room added a touch of elegance.

meanings.definition: A person who assists in a crime.
meanings.sent1: The accessories helped the thief in the robbery.
meanings.sent2: The police were looking for the accessories involved in the crime.
meanings.sent3: The accessories were caught red-handed at the scene.
meanings.sent4: The accessories' alibi fell apart under questioning.
meanings.sent5: The accessories' fingerprints were found at the crime scene.

meanings.definition: The act of approaching or entering a place or system.
meanings.sent1: The accessories to the building were well-designed.
meanings.sent2: The car's accessories made it easy to access the highway.
meanings.sent3: The accessories to the party were fashionably late.
meanings.sent4: The accessories to the new software improved user experience.
meanings.sent5: The accessories to the game allowed players to enter new levels.
